title: Madeline Brewer
summary: Madeline Kathryn Brewer (born May 1, 1992) is an American actress. She is known for her role as Tricia Miller in the Emmy award-winning series Orange Is the New Black (2013), her role in Hemlock Grove (2014–2015), and her lead role as Alice/Lola in the Netflix horror film Cam. She stars as Janine Lindo in the Hulu series The Handmaid's Tale (2017–present), which earned her an Emmy nomination for Outstanding Supporting Actress in a Drama Series.
